subject: Implement valid review suggestions
description:
After all reviews (product, CodeRabbit, local, quality) are complete, implement any valid suggestions that improve the code.

Steps:
1. Read all review findings from tasks 5-8
2. Evaluate each suggestion
3. Implement valid improvements
4. Run tests to ensure nothing breaks: `bun run test -- tests/unit/utils/fibonacci.test.ts`
5. Commit changes: `refactor: implement review suggestions for fibonacci`

learnings: Reviews were clean â€” no changes needed. Code already followed all conventions: immutability, DRY delegation, inline guard clauses, proper JSDoc, scoped eslint-disable.
